headline: Jim Cramer on TJX (TJX): “It’s a Winner, but the Stock Keeps Dropping”
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer Discusses These 10 Stocks & Says US Faces Unfairly High Tariffs Abroad. In this article, we are going to take a look at where The TJX Companies, Inc. (NYSE:TJX) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discusses.
